# Gitlab Docs
## How to install
Gitlab Docs is portable utility based in python so any system that supports python3 you will be able to install it.
### Python
```bash
pip3 install --user gitlab-docs
```

### Docker
```bash
docker run -v ${PWD}:/gitlab-docs charlieasmith93/gitlab-docs
```
